XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for the Olympiads block plugin

TABLE.NAME: block_olympiads
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores information about each olympiad event.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key for the olympiad record.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the Olympiad event (e.g., 'Mathematics Olympiad').

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp for the start date of student enrollment.

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp for the end date of student enrollment.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when this olympiad record was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when this olympiad record was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the Moodle user who last modified this record (fk to mdl_user.id).

TABLE.NAME: block_olympiads_registrations
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores registrations of users for specific olympiad events.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key for the registration record.

FIELD.NAME: olympiad_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the olympiad this registration belongs to (fk to block_olympiads.id).

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the Moodle user who registered (fk to mdl_user.id).

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when this registration was created.

KEY.NAME: unique_registration
KEY.COMMENT: Ensures a user can only register for an olympiad once.
